blocks.content: Define the refinement relation. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ref(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cref, copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(s1)), cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}

blocks.origin:
axiom df-locfin(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(clocfin, cmpt(s0, ctop, cab(s1, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cv(s1))), wral(s2, cuni(cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(crab(s4, cv(s1), wne(cin(cv(s4), cv(s3)), emptycls)), cfn))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-locfin(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ LocFin =(s0 ‚àà Top ‚Ü¶ { s1 |(‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ s1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ s0, ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà s0,(s2 ‚àà s3 ‚àß { s4 ‚àà s1 |(s4 ‚ãÇ s3)‚â† ‚àÖ } ‚àà Fin))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: refrel
blocks.content: Refinement is a relation. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: isref
blocks.content: The property of being a refinement of a cover. Dr. Nyikos once commented in class that the term "refinement" is actually misleading and that people are inclined to confuse it with the notion defined in ~ isfne . On the other hand, the two concepts do seem to have a dual relationship. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm isref(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cref, c2), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  pm5.21nd(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cref, c2), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe)))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cref, c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  brrelex2i(c0, cref, c2)
  refrel()
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  adantrr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cuni(c2), universe))
  eqeltrd(cuni(c2), universe, cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)))
  3eqtr3g(cuni(c2), cuni(c0), c3, c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  uniexb(c2)
  brabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, universe, cref, wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  eqeq2d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1)), c4, wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs1)), c4, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs1), c0)
  raleq(s0, cv(hs1), c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c3, cuni(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c2)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  rexeq(s1, cv(hs0), c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-ref(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isref(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0[Ref]c2 ‚Üî(c3 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1)))))
  ‚ä£ c4 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c2
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  pm5.21nd(c0 ‚àà c1, c0[Ref]c2, (c3 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1))), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  anim2i(c0 ‚àà c1, c0[Ref]c2, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  brrelex2i(c0, cref, c2)
  refrel()
  jca((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1)))), c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, (c3 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1))))
  adantrr(c0 ‚àà c1, c3 = c4, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 = c4), c2 ‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltrd(‚ãÉ c2, universe, ‚ãÉ c0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 = c4))
  3eqtr3g(‚ãÉ c2, ‚ãÉ c0, c3, c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 = c4))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà c1, c3 = c4)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c3 = c4, ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  uniexb(c2)
  brabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, universe, cref, (c3 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1))), (‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ hs1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0 ‚äÜ s1))), (‚ãÉ hs0 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0 ‚äÜ s1))))
  anbi12d(hs1 = c0, ‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ hs1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0 ‚äÜ s1)), ‚ãÉ hs0 = c4, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0 ‚äÜ s1)))
  eqeq2d(‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ hs1, c4, hs1 = c0)
  syl6eqr(‚ãÉ hs1, c4, ‚ãÉ c0, hs1 = c0)
  unieq(hs1, c0)
  raleq(s0, hs1, c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0 ‚äÜ s1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, ‚ãÉ hs0 = c4, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0 ‚äÜ s1)), c3 = c4, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1)))
  eqeq1d(‚ãÉ hs0, c4, c3, hs0 = c2)
  syl6eqr(‚ãÉ hs0, c3, ‚ãÉ c2, hs0 = c2)
  unieq(hs0, c2)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c2, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0 ‚äÜ s1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1))
  rexeq(s1, hs0, c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1)
  df-ref(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w((c3 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1))))
  diff.hs0.w((c3 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ s1))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: refbas
blocks.content: A refinement covers the same set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm refbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c1))
} = {
  mpancom(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  simprbda(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cref, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm refbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[Ref]c1 ‚Üí c2 = c3)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c1
} = {
  mpancom(c0[Ref]c1, c2 = c3, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  simprbda(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0[Ref]c1, c2 = c3, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)))
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: refssex
blocks.content: Every set in a refinement has a superset in the original cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm refssex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  imp(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0))))
  syl(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  mpancom(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  simplbda(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cref, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c0)))
  isref(hs0, s0, c0, universe, c1, cuni(c1), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  rspccv(hs0, c0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0))))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(c2, cv(s0)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm refssex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  imp(c0[Ref]c1, c2 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ s0))
  syl(c0[Ref]c1, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ s0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚äÜ s0)))
  mpancom(c0[Ref]c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚äÜ s0)), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  simplbda(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0[Ref]c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚äÜ s0)), ‚ãÉ c1 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  isref(hs0, s0, c0, universe, c1, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  rspccv(hs0, c0, c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚äÜ s0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ s0))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, hs0 = c2, hs0 ‚äÜ s0, c2 ‚äÜ s0)
  sseq1(hs0, c2, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ssref
blocks.content: A subcover is a refinement of the original cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssref(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)), wbr(c0, cref, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c2))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)), wbr(c0, cref, c2), wceq(c4, c3), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4), wceq(c4, c3))
  biimpi(wceq(c3, c4), wceq(c4, c3))
  eqcom(c3, c4)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  sylancl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  3ad2antl2(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  ssel2(c0, c2, cv(hs0))
  ssid(cv(hs0))
  rspcev(hs1, cv(hs0), c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  sseq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4), wb(wbr(c0, cref, c2), wa(wceq(c4, c3), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm ssref(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 = c4)‚Üí c0[Ref]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ c4 = ‚ãÉ c2
} = {
  mpbir2and((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 = c4), c0[Ref]c2, c4 = c3, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚äÜ c2, c3 = c4, c4 = c3)
  biimpi(c3 = c4, c4 = c3)
  eqcom(c3, c4)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 = c4), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1))
  sylancl(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 = c4)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs0)
  3ad2antl2(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚äÜ c2, c3 = c4, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  ssel2(c0, c2, hs0)
  ssid(hs0)
  rspcev(hs1, hs0, c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs0, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)
  sseq2(hs1, hs0, hs0)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚äÜ c2, c3 = c4, (c0[Ref]c2 ‚Üî(c4 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)))))
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 = c4))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ‚äÜ hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: refref
blocks.content: Reflexivity of refinement. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm refref(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cref, c0))
} = {
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cref, c0), wa(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c0)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  pm3.2i(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c0)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  rgen(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  ssid(cv(hs0))
  rspcev(hs1, cv(hs0), c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  sseq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c0, cuni(c0), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: reftr
blocks.content: Refinement is transitive. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm reftr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)), wbr(c0, cref, c2))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)), wbr(c0, cref, c2), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  sylan9eqr(cuni(c2), cuni(c0), cuni(c1), wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2))
  refbas(c1, c2, cuni(c2), cuni(c1))
  refbas(c0, c1, cuni(c1), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  ralrimiv(hs0, c0, wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  syld(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs2, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  ex(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs2, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  refssex(hs2, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  rexlimdvaa(hs2, c1, wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  mpd(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  ad2ant2lr(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  refssex(hs1, c1, c2, cv(hs2))
  ad2antll(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wi(wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  reximdv(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  sstr2(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cv(hs1))
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)), wb(wbr(c0, cref, c2), wa(wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, cuni(c2), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wbr(c1, cref, c2)))
  diff.hs2.w(wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs2))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm reftr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c1[Ref]c2)‚Üí c0[Ref]c2)
} = {
  mpbir2and((c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c1[Ref]c2), c0[Ref]c2, ‚ãÉ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)))

  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  ralrimiv(hs0, c0, (c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c1[Ref]c2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1))

  adantr(c0[Ref]c1, c1[Ref]c2, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚äÜ hs2)))
  ex(c0[Ref]c1, hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚äÜ hs2))
  refssex(hs2, c0, c1, hs0)
  rexlimdvaa(hs2, c1, (c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c1[Ref]c2), hs0 ‚äÜ hs2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1))
  mpd(((c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c1[Ref]c2)‚àß(hs2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ hs2)), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs2 ‚äÜ hs1))
  ad2ant2lr(c0[Ref]c1, c1[Ref]c2, hs2 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚äÜ hs2, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs2 ‚äÜ hs1))
  refssex(hs1, c1, c2, hs2)
  ad2antll((c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c1[Ref]c2), hs2 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚äÜ hs2, (‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs2 ‚äÜ hs1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)))
  reximdv(hs1, c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs2, hs2 ‚äÜ hs1, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)
  sstr2(hs0, hs2, hs1)
  syl((c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c1[Ref]c2), (c0[Ref]c2 ‚Üî(‚ãÉ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantr(c0[Ref]c1, c1[Ref]c2, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, ‚ãÉ c2, ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c1[Ref]c2))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.w((c0[Ref]c1 ‚àß c1[Ref]c2))
  diff.hs2.w(‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ hs1))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(hs2)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ‚äÜ hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.content: Adding the empty set preserves refinements. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2020.)

thm refun0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls)), wbr(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cref, c1))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls)), wbr(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cref, c1), wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c0)), wral(hs0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls), wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c0)))
  refbas(c0, c1, cuni(c1), cuni(c0))

  sylan2b(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(emptycls))), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls))))
  elun(cv(hs0), c0, csn(emptycls))
  jaodan(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  adantlr(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  refssex(hs1, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls))), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(emptycls, cv(hs1))))
  adantr(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(emptycls, cv(hs1))))
  reximdva0(hs1, c1, wbr(c0, cref, c1), wss(emptycls, cv(hs1)))
  a1i(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wss(emptycls, cv(hs1)))
  0ss(cv(hs1))
  adantl(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), wb(wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(emptycls, cv(hs1)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), wb(wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(emptycls, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  elsni(cv(hs0), emptycls)
  rexbidv(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(emptycls, cv(hs1)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wne(c1, emptycls), wb(wbr(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cref, c1), wa(wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c0)), wral(hs0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  syl(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wb(wbr(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cref, c1), wa(wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c0)), wral(hs0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe))
  sylancl(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wcel(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(csn(emptycls), universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  p0ex()
  unexg(c0, universe, csn(emptycls), universe)
  isref(hs0, hs1, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe, c1, cuni(c1), cuni(c0))

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: finptfin
blocks.content: A finite cover is a point-finite cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm finptfin(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cptfin))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cptfin), wral(hs0, cuni(c0), wcel(crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfn)))
  ralrimivw(hs0, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfn))
  rabfi(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  isptfin(hs0, hs1, c0, cfn, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfn))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
}

blocks.name: ptfinfin
blocks.content: A point covered by a point-finite cover is only covered by finitely many elements. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm ptfinfin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  imp(wcel(c0, cptfin), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cptfin), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cfn)))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cptfin), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cfn)))
  isptfin(hs0, s0, c0, cptfin, c2)
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c1, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cfn), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  eleq1d(crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cfn, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  rabbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà PtFin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí { s0 ‚àà c0 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà Fin)

blocks.name: finlocfin
blocks.content: A finite cover of a topological space is a locally finite cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm finlocfin(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wceq(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(clocfin, c0)))

  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c1))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wceq(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(clocfin, c0)), wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c2, c3), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(crab(hs2, c1, wne(cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), emptycls)), cfn)))))
  simp1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wceq(c2, c3))
  simp3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wceq(c2, c3))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wceq(c2, c3)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(crab(hs2, c1, wne(cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), emptycls)), cfn))))
  syl12anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wceq(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(crab(hs2, c1, wne(cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), emptycls)), cfn))), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(crab(hs2, c1, wne(cin(cv(hs2), c2), emptycls)), cfn))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wceq(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c0, ctop))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wceq(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  topopn(c0, c2)
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wceq(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))

blocks.name: locfintop

blocks.name: locfinnei
blocks.content: A point covered by a locally finite cover has a neighborhood which intersects only finitely many elements of the cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c1))

} = {

  islocfin(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  rspccva(hs0, c3, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(crab(s1, c0, wne(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)), cfn))), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(crab(s1, c0, wne(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)), cfn))))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(crab(s1, c0, wne(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)), cfn)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(crab(s1, c0, wne(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)), cfn)))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(crab(s1, c0, wne(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)), cfn), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))

  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: locfincmp
blocks.content: For a compact space, the locally finite covers are precisely the finite covers. Sadly, this property does not properly characterize all compact spaces. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: unisngl
blocks.content: Taking the union of the set of singletons recovers the initial set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: locfindis
blocks.content: The locally finite covers of a discrete space are precisely the point-finite covers. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm locfindis(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(clocfin, cpw(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wceq(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cfv(clocfin, cpw(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wceq(c1, c2)))
  jca(wcel(c0, cfv(clocfin, cpw(c1))), wcel(c0, cptfin), wceq(c1, c2))
  lfinpfin(c0, cpw(c1))
  locfinbas(c0, cpw(c1), c1, c2)
  syl3anbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(clocfin, cpw(c1))), wcel(cpw(c1), ctop), wceq(c1, c2), wral(hs0, c1, wrex(hs1, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(crab(hs2, c0, wne(cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), emptycls)), cfn)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(cpw(c1), ctop), wcel(c1, universe))
  eqeltrd(c1, universe, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wceq(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cptfin), wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl5eqel(c2, universe, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cptfin))
  uniexg(c0, cptfin)
  distop(c1, universe)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wceq(c1, c2)), wrex(hs1, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(crab(hs2, c0, wne(cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), emptycls)), cfn))))

blocks.name: locfincf
blocks.content: A locally finite cover in a coarser topology is locally finite in a finer topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: comppfsc
blocks.content: A space where every open cover has a point-finite subcover is compact. This is significant in part because it shows half of the proposition that if only half the generalization in the definition of metacompactness (and consequently paracompactness) is performed, one does not obtain any more spaces. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm comppfsc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c0, ccmp), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cptfin, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1)))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, ccmp), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cptfin, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1))))))))
  ralrimiv(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c0, ccmp), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cptfin, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1)))))))
  syl5(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cptfin, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1)))))), wss(cv(s0), c0))
